original_text: But no sin offering shall be eaten from which any blood is brought into the tent of meeting to make atonement in the Holy Place; it shall be burned up with fire.
korean_text: 그러나 피를 가지고 회막에 들어가 성소에서 속죄하게 한 속죄제 제물의 고기는 먹지 못할지니 불사를지니라

sentences.original_text: But no sin offering shall be eaten
sentences.korean_translation: 그러나 어떤 속죄 제물도 먹어서는 안 됩니다

sentences.original_text: from which any blood is brought into the tent of meeting
to make atonement in the Holy Place
it shall be burned up with fire.
